Class Tn3270ProtocolModule

java.lang.Object
ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.protocol.tn3270.Tn3270ProtocolModule
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProtocolModule
public final class Tn3270ProtocolModule extends Object implements ProtocolModule
ProtocolModule implementation for TN3270 traffic.
Since:
RADAR 0.1-doc

    • matchesSignature

      public boolean matchesSignature(byte[] prefacePeek)
      Checks if the flow's early bytes resemble TN3270 Telnet negotiation.
      Specified by:
      matchesSignature in interface ProtocolModule
      Parameters:
      prefacePeek - leading bytes from the stream; may be null
      Returns:
      true if TN3270 markers are observed
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc
      Implementation Note:
      Delegates to Tn3270Signature.

    • newReconstructor

      public MessageReconstructor newReconstructor(FiveTuple flow, ClockPort clock, MetricsPort metrics)
      Creates a new Tn3270MessageReconstructor for the flow.
      Specified by:
      newReconstructor in interface ProtocolModule
      Parameters:
      flow - five-tuple describing the session
      clock - clock port used for timestamps
      metrics - metrics sink for TN3270-specific counters
      Returns:
      TN3270 reconstructor
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if clock or metrics is null
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc
